alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 15 at 12:56AM MST until February 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Temperatures in the upper 20s expected. Winds have subsided, though breezy conditions will continue for the next several hours. * WHERE...Tonto Basin, San Carlos and Globe/Miami. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Tonto Basin
